dmca.title: Policies for legal matters
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

________________________________

From: Cyberia IT [mailto:neo@cyberia.ca] 
Posted At: Sunday, June 18, 2006 4:09 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Policies for legal matters
Subject: Policies for legal matters


Greetings,
 
My name is Debra Boniface and I am contacting you regarding a domain on
your network. The domain is NetKreations.com. On theis account is a 375
meg file called Turnkey_Websites.zip. I cannot access this file directly
as it was originally downloaded via an expired link protection scheme
where the original URL was not displayed however I believe it is located
at this URL:
http://www.netkreations.com/ebay/PowerSellerGuaranteed/Turnkey_Websites.
zip
<http://www.netkreations.com/ebay/PowerSellerGuaranteed/Turnkey_Websites
.zip> 
 
The owner of the account Scott or Tracey Stewart of Calgary, Alberta
Canada is being sue'd for distributing this file. If you open the file
you will find that all the zips contains a config.php file with this
email address neo@cyberia.ca <mailto:neo@cyberia.ca>  and in some cases
reference to a domain I own.
 
I require your policies and or proceedure to obtain a letter from
theplanet.com that this file does reside on your server and that the
account is in the name or Scott or Tracey Stewart. Once recieved I will
be filing a DMCA for removal.
 
Thank you,
 
Debra Boniface
1-403-668-7987
